com.ociweb.xml

Interface PrologWAX

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CommonWAX
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    PrologOrElementWAX
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    WAX

    public interface PrologWAX
extends CommonWAX
    This interface defines the methods that can be called while writing the prologue section of an XML document.
